title: Best of the Program | Guests: Rep. J.D. Bernardy & Riley Moore | 1/19/22
description:
Glenn exposes the World Economic Forum. West Virginia State Treasurer Riley Moore joins Glenn to discuss the state ending its use of BlackRock investments and the attempt to take over our banks. Author Alex Epstein joins Glenn to discuss BlackRock’s relationship with Texas, ESG Scores, and the future of energy.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
